projects.title: moviewatchers
projects.subtitle: Video Streaming App
projects.description: Proof-of-concept app built with React, TypeScript, and Go, allowing users to stream locally stored movies and shows with high-quality playback.

projects.title: Universal Wealth
projects.subtitle: Financial Tracking App
projects.description: Full-stack app built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL for monitoring stock prices and trends in real-time.

projects.title: Christmas Trivia Maze
projects.subtitle: Game Application
projects.description: Trivia maze game built with Java, Java Swing, and SQLite, where users answer questions to navigate through a holiday-themed maze.

projects.title: Derivatives Calculator
projects.subtitle: Mathematics Tool
projects.description: Console-based calculator built with Java, computing symbolic and numerical derivatives with approximately 90% accuracy.

projects.title: JazzList
projects.subtitle: Music Discovery App
projects.description: Web scraper-based app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, helping users explore jazz saxophonists and discover new artists and works.
